channel.title: Day By Day English
channel.description: Day By Day English is a podcast for beginners and English learners. I speak slowly and clearly, using short sentences and simple words. Each episode is short and focused on pronunciation, speaking, and listening. Together, we grow step by step — day by day. 🇬🇧✨
